General.Name: Chips&Media Inc
General.Description: Chips&Media, Inc. develops and sells ultra-low power multi-codec video IPs to semiconductor companies in South Korea and internationally. It provides video codec, image signal processing, and image processing video IP cores, as well as computational photography and object detection IPs for the surveillance, automotive, and electronic markets. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
